title: Monkey searches Indian police officer's hair for lice
text:
This is the bizarre moment when a monkey started searching a police officer's hair for lice in northern India.

The incident, which was filmed on Tuesday, occurred in Pilibhit city in Uttar Pradesh.

Despite having a hungry monkey sitting on his shoulder interrogating his hair, the officer seems content to continue with his work.

Officer Shrikant Dvivedi allowed the monkey to sit on him for around 20 minutes while at his desk at the police station in Pilibhit city in Uttar Pradesh

Witnesses said the monkey arrived in the police station yesterday morning and refused to leave the precinct.

The officer, Shrikant Dvivedi allowed the monkey to sit on him for around 20 minutes.

When the monkey got bored, he bounded off the officer's shoulder and climbed a tree outside the police station.
